name: Udylite Corporation, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Zoning Board of Adjustment
name_abbreviation: Udylite Corp. v. Philadelphia Zoning Board of Adjustment

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and McBride, JJ.
parties: Udylite Corporation, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Zoning Board of Adjustment.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment in the above captioned case is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Sporkin of Court of Common Pleas No. 2 of Philadelphia County.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: D. Arthur Magaziner, with him Milton A. Feldman, and Sterling, Magaziner, Stern & Levy, for appellants.
James L. Stern, Deputy City Solicitor, with him Gordon Cavanaugh, Assistant City Solicitor, and David Berger, City Solicitor, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Udylite Corporation, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Zoning Board of Adjustment.
March 16, 1959:
Argued January- 5, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and McBride, JJ.
D. Arthur Magaziner, with him Milton A. Feldman, and Sterling, Magaziner, Stern & Levy, for appellants.
James L. Stern, Deputy City Solicitor, with him Gordon Cavanaugh, Assistant City Solicitor, and David Berger, City Solicitor, for appellee.
